CmdLine: set -x  && apk add --no-cache ca-certificates curl ffmpeg python gnupg  && curl -Lo /usr/local/bin/youtube-dl https://yt-dl.org/downloads/latest/youtube-dl  && curl -Lo youtube-dl.sig https://yt-dl.org/downloads/latest/youtube-dl.sig  && gpg --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys '7D33D762FD6C35130481347FDB4B54CBA4826A18'  && gpg --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 'ED7F5BF46B3BBED81C87368E2C393E0F18A9236D'  && gpg --verify youtube-dl.sig /usr/local/bin/youtube-dl  && chmod a+rx /usr/local/bin/youtube-dl  && rm youtube-dl.sig  && apk del curl gnupg  && mkdir /downloads  && chmod a+rw /downloads  && youtube-dl --version
Commands.Name: run
